planet.name: MOA-2011-BLG-322 b
HJD 2455773 b
planet.description: MOA-2001-BLG-322 b is a giant planet which was discovered by MOA, OGLE and the Wise Observatory. These observatories form a network and conduct a second generation microlensing survey. The survey aims to discover and characterize extrasolar planets and their frequency, by means of round-the-clock high-cadence monitoring of a large area of the Galactic bulge.
